<!-- docs:child of bal-list -->

# bal-list-item-icon

`bal-list-item-subtitle` is a child component of `bal-list` that defines the subtitle list row element.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                         | Type      | Default |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `right`  | `right`   | If `true` the icon is on the right side of the list item. Default is the left side. | `boolean` | `false` |


## Dependencies

### Used by

 - [bal-file-upload](../bal-file-upload)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  bal-file-upload --> bal-list-item-icon
  style bal-list-item-icon fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
